testCaseProjects.title: Test Case Projects
testCaseProjects.description: List of YouTrack projects where test cases can be stored as issues. If empty, test cases are created in the current project.

testRunProjects.title: Test Run Projects
testRunProjects.description: List of YouTrack projects where test runs can be stored as issues. If empty, test runs are created in the current project.

testSuiteProjects.title: Test Suite Projects
testSuiteProjects.description: List of projects that can contain test suites. Test suites are stored in project extension properties.

testCaseIssueType.title: Test Case Issue Type
testCaseIssueType.description: Issue type name for test cases (e.g., 'Test Case'). Can be configured per project if different projects use different issue types.

testRunIssueType.title: Test Run Issue Type
testRunIssueType.description: Issue type name for test runs (e.g., 'Test Run'). Can be configured per project if different projects use different issue types.

testSuiteCustomFieldName.title: Test Suite Custom Field Name
testSuiteCustomFieldName.description: Name of the custom field used to store test suites. Usually consistent across projects.
